title: Ambient Video Game Music - Meadows
description: Embrace the serene beauty of the English countryside with this collection of 10 ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Embrace the serene beauty of the English countryside with this collection of 10 ambience tracks, designed to encapsulate the soothing tranquillity of lush meadows. Intended for game developers, this collection delivers a natural soundscape of birdsong, gentle animal noises, and occasional soft rain, all interwoven to transport players to these idyllic landscapes.


Each track within this collection is an authentic auditory portrait of a peaceful English meadow. The melodious calls of diverse bird species form the foreground, providing a delightful auditory experience that breathes life into the game environment. Gentle animal sounds, from the rustle of small mammals to the distant lowing of cattle, further enhance the rural atmosphere, offering an immersive backdrop of natural harmony.


To enrich the sensory depth, occasional rain showers are delicately incorporated. The soft patter of rain falling on grass and leaves imparts a soothing rhythm to the soundscape, reflecting the region's varied weather patterns and intensifying the player's immersion in the environment.


This collection is a remarkable resource for game developers aiming to create realistic and engaging rural environments. With the combination of birdsong, animal sounds, gentle rain showers, and the unifying soundtrack, players are provided with a comprehensive sensory experience of an English meadow. Every exploration or quest within these environments becomes a journey of tranquillity and vibrant natural life, promising a truly unique gaming experience.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!
